name: Colonizer (itch) (Orbital32)
description:
The objective of the game is to terraform every planet and moon in the game, then activate the warp gate. There is a mobile port.

Controls: WASD to move, Space to interact (some objects require you to also have your mouse on them), E to open inventory, R to open customization, and T to open the quests (guide) menu.

Travel to planets by holding W in the rocket, then clicking the icon for the planet you want to travel to. You can mine resources and build bases on planets or moons.

You can build by first purchasing items in the shop, then go to a planet or moon. Open your inventory, and click the icon of the item you bought. A phantom version of that item will follow your mouse until you left click on the screen.
